entry.title: Bash Prompt
entry.content:
Tried to create a new bash prompt today. It’s intended to show your current git branch in red if there have been any changes or green if there are no uncommitted changes. Otherwise it’s the same as my old prompt, with yellow path and cyan host name. Here’s the source gist:

And a screenshot:

entry.title: TripleSpec Slit Mapping
entry.content:
Working on a TripleSpec Slit Mapping project on github. In its previous iteration, we assumed a fixed offset of 0.5” per step, and no pointing errors. This method uses the slit viewer to derive a pointing solution using astrometry.net, then apply that solution to each slit position to make a map.

Work is largely based on this post idea

entry.title: Fourier Upsampling
entry.content:
I wrote some stuff on Fourier interpolation techniques.

Here’s the link: fourier tools

A discussion about adding it into skimage: skimage group
